user.name: user
user.columns: `user_id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`role` VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,`account` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,`password` VARCHAR(12) NOT NULL,`nickname` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`user_id`),UNIQUE INDEX `account_UNIQUE` (`account` ASC) VISIBLE,UNIQUE INDEX `user_id_UNIQUE` (`user_id` ASC) VISIBLE

tempInfo.name: tempInfo
tempInfo.columns: `account` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, `password` VARCHAR(6) NOT NULL, `applyTime` DATETIME NOT NULL

product.name: product
product.columns: `product_id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`productNum` INT NOT NULL,`category` VARCHAR(12) NOT NULL,`productName`VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, `thumbnail` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,`price` INT NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`product_id`),UNIQUE INDEX `user_id_UNIQUE` (`product_id` ASC) VISIBLE,UNIQUE INDEX `thumbnail_UNIQUE` (`thumbnail` ASC) VISIBLE

productDetail.name: productDetail
productDetail.columns: `product_id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`productNum` INT NOT NULL,`detail` VARCHAR(4000) NULL,`inventory` INT NOT NULL,`img` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`product_id`),UNIQUE INDEX `account_UNIQUE` (`productNum` ASC) VISIBLE,UNIQUE INDEX `img_UNIQUE` (`img` ASC) VISIBLE

cart.name: cart
cart.columns: `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`user_id` INT NOT NULL,`create_at` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,PRIMARY KEY (`id`),INDEX `user_id_idx` (`user_id` ASC) VISIBLE,CONSTRAINT `user_id` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `user` (`user_id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION

cart_item.name: cart_item
cart_item.columns: `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`cart_id` INT NOT NULL,`product_id` INT NOT NULL,`quantity` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,`create_at` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,PRIMARY KEY (`id`),INDEX `cart_id_idx` (`cart_id` ASC) VISIBLE,INDEX `product_id_idx` (`product_id` ASC) VISIBLE, CONSTRAINT `cart_id` FOREIGN KEY (`cart_id`) REFERENCES `cart` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `product_id` FOREIGN KEY (`product_id`) REFERENCES `productDetail` (`product_id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION

orderDetail.name: orderDetail
orderDetail.columns: `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`orderNum` INT NOT NULL,`productNum` INT NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`),UNIQUE INDEX `account_UNIQUE` (`productNum` ASC) VISIBLE

orderList.name: orderList
orderList.columns: `orderNum` INT NOT NULL,`account` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,`orderTime` DATETIME NOT NULL,`pay_status` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,`deliver_status` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,`order_amount` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,`sendName` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,`sendAdd` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,`payWay` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,`totalPrice` INT NOT NULL,UNIQUE INDEX `account_UNIQUE` (`orderNum` ASC) VISIBLE,PRIMARY KEY (`orderNum`)
orderList.columnName: orderNum, account, orderTime, pay_status, deliver_status, order_amount, sendName, sendAdd, payWay, totalPrice
